PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_InstallationOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties defining installation information for occurrences of element, asset or system.

PropertyDef.Name: InstallationDate
PropertyDef.Definition: Date on which the element is installed.

PropertyDef.Name: AcceptanceDate
PropertyDef.Definition: Date on which the element is accepted by the manager or administrator.

PropertyDef.Name: PutIntoOperationDate
PropertyDef.Definition: Date on which the element is put into operation.
